title: Task Decomposition Output
description: Structured decomposition of a requirement into independent sub-tasks

summary.description: Brief overview of the requirement and decomposition strategy

title.description: Short imperative title (e.g. 'Add user authentication middleware')

description.description: Detailed implementation instructions including what to build, how it should work, and any constraints

files_to_modify.description: Exact file paths this task will create or modify. MUST NOT overlap with other tasks

files_to_read.description: Files to read for context but NOT modify

dependencies.description: IDs of tasks that must complete before this one can start. Empty array means no dependencies

acceptance_criteria.description: Checklist of verifiable conditions that must be true when the task is complete
